text: Jang Won-young (born 31 August 2004) is a South Korean singer and television host. She is known for being a part of the South Korean girl group Iz*One. Since 2021, she is part of the girl group Ive. == Career == In 2018, Jang was in the talent show . She represented . She was first place and was a member of Iz*One until the group broke up on 21 April 2021. In 2021, Jang went back to Starship Entertainment with , who was another member of Iz*One. In 2023, she hosted the television show with . Jang and Sunghoon won the Best Couple Award at the . In December 2021, Jang became a member of Ive. She helped host the in 2021, 2022, 2023, and in 2024. title: Jang Won-young
